text: Are there any packages with ELM already implemented? There is ELM.jl but it is archived and its last commit is from 2014

elements.text: Are there any packages with ELM already implemented? There is ELM.jl but it is archived and its last commit is from 2014

text: I think <@UPUBAM63X> has an ELM implementation in ChemometricsTools.jl

elements.text: I think
has an ELM implementation in ChemometricsTools.jl

text:
I do have an ELM in chemometrics tools, there's also one in the SciML ecosystem! Also if you look at the code for an ELM in chemometrics tools, I'd encourage you to write your own - its simple, but could be customizeable.
<https://github.com/caseykneale/ChemometricsTools.jl/blob/cf53867beb273bffc6deb22d8d060a09c68278ae/src/RegressionModels.jl#L250>

elements.text: I do have an ELM in chemometrics tools, there's also one in the SciML ecosystem! Also if you look at the code for an ELM in chemometrics tools, I'd encourage you to write your own - its simple, but could be customizeable.

text: Also encourage you to check out LS-SVM/Kernel Ridge regression if you need something more reliable rather then fast :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: Also encourage you to check out LS-SVM/Kernel Ridge regression if you need something more reliable rather then fast
